message: Hi Bob, let's be fair and split the money 60/40.  It's best to settle this quickly before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
Let's reverse the roles.  I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  While we're losing value with each round, it's a fair compromise to get things moving.
Bob, I understand you want a larger share, but your previous offer wasn't fair considering I proposed a better split in the first round. Let's compromise - 55/45.  Each round costs us money!
